TCP use synchronization packets,and UDP uses acknowledgement packets

when the cable length limits are exceeded
when one side of the connection is configured for half-duplex
when Carner Sense Multiple Access/Collision Detection is used
when a collision occurs after the 32nd byte of a frame has been transmitted

combines control and data plane functionality on a single device to minimize latency
moves from a two-tier to a three-tier network architecture to provide maximum redundancy
allows configuration and monitoring of the network from one centralized point

The administrative distance must be higher on the primary route so that the backup route becomes secondary.

auto
active

questions.question: Drag the descriptions of device management from the left onto the types of device management on the right.

items.text: monitor the cloud for software update
uses CLI templates to apply consistent configuration to multiple devices at an individual location
Uses NetFlow to analyze potential security threats throughout the network and take appropriate action on that traffic
Implements changes via an SSH terminal
manages device configuration on a per-device basis
Security is manages near the perimeter od the network with firewalls, VPNs, and IPS

questions.question: Drag the descriptions of IP protocol transmissions from the left onto the IP traffic types on the right.

items.text: uses a lower transmission rate to ensure relability
uses a higher transmission rate to support latency-sensitive application

questions.question: Drag the characteristics of networking from the left onto the correct networking types on the right.

An engineer is tasked with verifying network configuration parameters on a client workstation to report back to the team lead. Drag and drop the node identifiers from the left onto the network parameters on the right.

pairs.right: last assignable IP address in the subnet

questions.question: A network analyst is tasked with configuring the date and time on a router using EXEC mode. The date must be set to January 1, 2020 and the time must be set to 12:00 am. What command should be used?

choices: clock timezone
clock summer-time date
clock set
clock summer-time recurring

questions.question:
Refer to the exhibit. After the election process, what is the root bridge in the HQ LAN?
Switch 1: 0C:E0:38:57:24:59
Switch 2: 0C:0E:15:22:1A:61
Switch 3: 0C:0E:15:1D:3C:9A
Switch 4: 0C:E0:19:A1:4D:16

choices: Switch 1
Switch 2
Switch 3
Switch 4

questions.question: Which function is performed by the collapsed core layer in a two-tier architecture?

choices: applying security policies
attaching users to the edge of the network
enforcing routing policies
marking interesting traffic for data policies

questions.question: What are two functions of a server on a network?

choices: runs applications that send and retrieve data for workstations that make requests
handles requests from multiple workstations at the same time
housed solely in a data center that is dedicated to a single client
achieves redundancy by exclusively using virtual server clustering
runs the same operating system in order to communicate with other servers

questions.question: What is a function of a remote access VPN?

choices: used exclusively when a user is connected to a company's internal network
allows the users to access company internal network resources through a secure tunnel
uses cryptographic tunneling to protect the privacy of data for multiple users simultaneously
establishes a secure tunnel between two branch sites

questions.question: What are two recommendations for protecting network ports from being exploited when located in an office space outside of an IT closet?

choices: shut down unused ports
configure static ARP entries
enable the PortFast feature on ports
implement port-based authentication
configure ports to a fixed speed

questions.question: Refer to the exhibit. A network administrator must permit SSH access to remotely manage routers in a network. The operations team resides on the 10.20.1.0/25 network. Which command will accomplish this task?

choices: access-list 2699 permit udp 10.20.1.0 0.0.0.255
no access-list 2699 deny tcp any 10.20.1.0 0.0.0.127 eq 22
access-list 2699 permit tcp any 10.20.1.0 0.0.0.255 eq 22
no access-list 2699 deny ip any 10.20.1.0 0.0.0.255

questions.question: Drag the characteristics of network architectures from the left onto the type of architecture on the right.

items.text: single device handles the core and the distribution layer
most appropriate for small network designs
separate devices handle the core and the distribution layer

questions.question: Drag and drop the SNMP components from the left onto the descriptions on the right.

pairs.right: collection of variables that can be monitored
responds to status requests and requests for information about a device

questions.question: An engineer is tasked to configure a switch with port security to ensure devices that forward unicasts, multicasts, and broadcasts are unable to flood the port. The port must be configured to permit only two random MAC addresses at a time. Drag and drop the required configuration commands from the left onto the sequence on the right.
Which two functions are performed by the core layer in a three-tier architecture?

choices: Ensure timely data transfer between layers
Provide uninterrupted forwarding service
Inspect packets for malicious activity
Police traffic that is sent to the edge of the network
Provide direct connectivity for end user devices

questions.question: What is the purpose of traffic shaping?

choices: to provide fair queuing for buffered flows
to mitigate delays over slow links
to limit the bandwidth that a flow can use
to be a marking mechanism that identifies different flows

questions.question: When using Rapid PVST+, which command guarantees the switch is always the root bridge for VLAN 200?

choices: spanning-tree vlan 200 priority 614440
spanning-tree vlan 200 priority 0
spanning-tree vlan 200 priority 38572422
spanning-tree vlan 200 root primary

questions.question: Which command must be entered to configure a DHCP relay?

choices: ip helper-address
ip address dhcp
ip dhcp pool
ip dhcp relay

questions.question: When implementing a router as a DHCP server, which two features must be configured?

choices: relay agent information
address pool
smart-relay
database agent
manual bindings

questions.question: How does the dynamically-learned MAC address feature function?

choices: The CAM table is empty until ingress traffic arrives at each port
Switches dynamically learn MAC addresses of each connecting CAM table
The ports are restricted and learn up to a maximum of 10 dynamically-learned addresses
It requires a minimum number of secure MAC addresses to be filled dynamically

questions.question: What facilitates a Telnet connection between devices by entering the device name?

choices: SNMP
DNS lookup
syslog
NTP

questions.question: Which technology can prevent client devices from arbitrarily connecting to the network without state remediation?

choices: IP Source Guard
MAC Authentication Bypass

questions.question: A port security violation has occurred on a switch port due to the maximum MAC address count being exceeded. Which command must be configured to increment the security-violation count and forward an SNMP trap?

choices: switchport port-security violation access
switchport port-security violation protect
switchport port-security violation restrict
switchport port-security violation shutdown

questions.question: Refer to the exhibit. Which command configures a floating static route to provide a backup to the primary link?
